li.a: MAYVILLE HIGH SCHOOL INAUGURAL ATHLETIC HALL OF FAME INDUCTION CEREMONY WAS HELD ON SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 28, 2019
li.br: This will be an annual event and the attendance was outstanding. Below are pictures from the Induction ceremony.

div.div: The mission of Mayville Community Schools is to be a cornerstone of the community that provides a safe environment and a quality education, preparing our students for success at the next level while developing and supporting lifelong learners.
